topics.body:
I just went to see It follows. This movie is fucking spooky. It also feels like a love letter to the original Halloween. The soundtrack is all synth(think in between carpenter and the hotline Miami soundtrack) and the way the titular "it" will just show up in the background with no scare chord or reaction from anyone is very similar to Michael Myers. 

Just don't go seeing it expecting closure. None o that in this movie.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5516f41b636872744c7d0600#post_5516f41b636872744c7d0600
And? I don't ask people to bear the whole world, I ask them to treat others fairly, I'm not asking you to divert your efforts from helping homeless people, I'm asking you to consider that right now some poor kids parents have to explain to him why he has to be afraid of the police even though he didn't do anything wrong, there is allot of pain in the world, no one can handle it all, and we all pick the parts we think we have the best chance at fixing, I am a feminist because i believe that we can stop many rapes by simply changing how Woman are viewed, I personally believe it's better to try and prevent it then react to it, but that doesn't mean i think we shouldn't, but what you are calling for is band aids, if we did what you are saying then we would have never moved past the jim crow era, And that isn't right, there is a big world out there, and we need to try and fix it all, and each of us owes it to the rest to at least let them do there part, as they think is best,

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5516f5bf63687273d62e0500#post_5516f5bf63687273d62e0500
My sister got out early enough that she's now living a normal life.  My mom has taken years to get over the mental trauma of being raped for a decade.

Oh that's just the start of it dude.  My step-dad originally planned of forcing his own daughter to bear his child, but cause she's gay he became a homophobe and would call people "faggot" constantly and he hated me cause I wasn't a girl and therefore he couldn't do that shit to me.

Basically his plan was:
Force his ten year old child to bear his child -> she's gay -> get a wife -> she got old -> replace her with his wife's daughter -> she says no -> puts her into a "camp" -> cause I was born a dude and he was straight he couldn't do shit to me -> his entire plan fell apart.

Oh also he made my mom go onto anti-depressants to make her physically dependant on staying with him and now she can't ever go off them.

We're doing fine though; it's been five years and while it's a lot of mental trauma to get over everyone's doing a lot better.  The family still has a lot of problems but everything's a lot better than it was.

I like how Thanatos is going, "nuh-uh!  Your family never had it rough!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
